ai-patthana15.28:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.28:0.3_0: Transmigration over the skillful, and so on,
ai-patthana15.28:1.1_0: Without giving up this skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the skillful.
ai-patthana15.28:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.28:1.1_3: I’m skilled in the ways of doing unskillful.
ai-patthana15.28:2.1_0: One has not declared this because of this teaching.
ai-patthana15.28:3.1_0: Not repulsion is skillful, no unskillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana15.28:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.28:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
